Reference

Included Datasets

species_traits

Data: species x traits of Western Europe mammals

site_species

Data: sites x species of Western Europe mammals occurrences

site_locations

Data: sites x locations of Western Europe mammals occurrences

Formatting Functions

Fit your dataset to the expected format by funbiogeo

fb_format_site_locations()

Format site x locations object

fb_format_site_species()

Format site x species object

fb_format_species_traits()

Format species x traits object

Trait Coverage functions

Count species, traits, sites by trait coverage (proportion of species with known traits). Also filter datasets based on their coverages.

fb_count_species_by_trait()

Compute species coverage for each trait

fb_count_traits_by_species()

Compute traits coverage for each species

fb_get_trait_coverage_by_site()

Compute traits coverage

fb_get_all_coverages()

Compute Trait Coverage per Site for All Traits

fb_filter_sites_by_trait_coverage()

Filter sites with a given trait coverage threshold

fb_filter_species_by_trait_coverage()

Filter species with a given traits coverage threshold

fb_filter_traits_by_species_coverage()

Filter traits with a given species coverage threshold

Functional Diversity Functions

fb_cwm()

Compute community-weighted means (CWM) of trait values

Upscaling functions

Aggregate your site data over a coarser spatial grid

fb_get_environment()

Extract average raster values at sites locations

fb_aggregate_site_data()

Aggregate site data along coarser grid

Visualization functions

fb_map_raster()

Map a raster layer

fb_map_site_traits_completeness()

Map Trait Coverage Per Site

fb_plot_distribution_site_trait_coverage()

Distribution of Trait Coverages across all sites

fb_plot_number_species_by_trait()

Show Number of Species per Trait

fb_plot_number_traits_by_species()

Show Number of Traits per Species

fb_plot_site_traits_completeness()

Plot Sites per Traits Completeness

fb_plot_species_traits_completeness()

Show Species by Trait Completeness
